#+TITLE: rofi
#+PROPERTY: header-args :dir $HOME/.config/rofi :tangle config

* Size and position
Not too wide. Not to tall. Just right.
#+BEGIN_SRC conf
rofi.lines: 10
rofi.width: 30
#+END_SRC

Personally, I like 'dropdown' type things to show up in the top / center. 2 is the [[bookmark:][magic]] number that makes that happen. So =rofi= will be centered and shifted down:
#+BEGIN_SRC conf
rofi.location: 2
rofi.yoffset: 150
#+END_SRC

* Look and feel
- [ ] Refactor to using [[bookmark:][=rasi=]] for look and feel also take a look at [[https://github.com/davatorium/rofi-themes][rofi-themes]] on github
 
** Decluttering
Reducing the things going on: no scrollbar & a solid separator.
#+BEGIN_SRC conf
rofi.hide-scrollbar: true
rofi.scrollbar-width: 0
rofi.separator-style: solid
#+END_SRC

** Spacing
I like spacing, so add plenty of that
#+BEGIN_SRC conf
rofi.padding: 49
rofi.line-margin: 5
rofi.bw: 15
#+END_SRC

** Colors
:PROPERTIES:
:header-args+: :var none="argb:00000000" bg=colors/get(role="bg") fg=colors/get(role="fg")
:header-args+: :var bg-alt=colors/get(role="bg-alt") active=colors/get(role="accent")
:END:

Make it beautiful!
#+BEGIN_SRC conf :noweb yes
rofi.color-enabled: true

# Window:          background, border,      separator
rofi.color-window: #${bg},     #${bg-alt}, #${bg-alt}

# State:           bg,      fg,     altbg,    hlbg,   hlfg
rofi.color-normal: ${none}, #${fg}, ${none}, ${none}, #${active}
rofi.color-active: ${none}, #${fg}, ${none}, ${none}, #${active}
rofi.color-urgent: ${none}, #${fg}, ${none}, ${none}, #${active}
#+END_SRC


** Fonts
#+BEGIN_SRC conf
rofi.font: <<fonts/get-name()>> 22
#+END_SRC

* Behavior
I don't want auto-select to be on, so I turn it off. (Although it seems its always off)
#+BEGIN_SRC conf
rofi.auto-select: false
#+END_SRC

Use regex for searching by default
#+BEGIN_SRC conf
rofi.matching: regex
#+END_SRC
